edge_schema.summary: 11-D legacy edge features (distance + atom distance histogram).

edge.description: Reproduces the original 11-dimensional edge attributes consisting of residue pair distance and a 10-bin histogram of inter-atomic distances, scaled to [0, 1].

parameters.distance_max: Maximum interface Cα distance (Å) to include an edge.
parameters.distance_min: Minimum interface Cα distance (Å) to include an edge.
parameters.jobs: Optional override for edge assembly worker count.
parameters.scale_features: Apply MinMax scaling across edge features.

edge.summary: 11-D legacy edge features (distance + atom distance histogram).

interface.description: Identifies interface residues across chains using the polar interface routine (new_calculate_interface.process_pdb_file) with configurable distance cutoff and coordinate rounding.

parameters.coordinate_decimals: Decimal places for coordinate rounding in output files (-1 skips rounding).
parameters.cutoff: Distance cutoff in Å for interface residue detection.
parameters.jobs: Optional override for parallel worker count.

interface.summary: Polar interface detection using distance cutoff.

node.description: Runs the DSSP-based node feature extractor (node_fea) and merges results with persistent homology statistics aligned by residue IDs.

parameters.drop_na: Drop rows containing NA values after merging.
parameters.jobs: Optional override for thread worker count.

node.summary: DSSP-derived node features merged with topology statistics.

topology.description: Generates per-residue topological descriptors using the persistent homology pipeline from new_topological_features. Interface residues are required as input.

parameters.dedup_sort: Enable deduplication & sorting of persistence pairs.
parameters.element_filters: Sequence of element subsets considered for statistics.
parameters.jobs: Optional override for parallel worker count.
parameters.neighbor_distance: Neighbourhood radius in Å for complex filtration.

topology.summary: Persistent homology features with configurable distance thresholds.

feature_config.text:
# Auto-generated feature-config template
# Pick one module per required stage. Edit parameter values as needed.
# Run `./run_graph_builder2.sh --list-modules` for detailed descriptions.
defaults:
  jobs: 16  # Optional global worker override; remove if unused.

# REQUIRED stage: interface
interface:
  module: interface/polar_cutoff/v1  # alias: TopoQA default 10A cut-off
  alias: "n x 3D TopoQA default 10A cut-off"
  summary: "Polar interface detection using distance cutoff."
  description: "Identifies interface residues across chains using the polar interface routine (new_calculate_interface.process_pdb_file) with configurable distance cutoff and coordinate rounding."
  params:
    cutoff: 10.0
    coordinate_decimals: -1  # skip rounding to keep raw coords
    jobs: 16

# OPTIONAL stage: topology
topology:
  module: topology/persistence_basic/v1  # alias: TopoQA default
  alias: "140D TopoQA default"
  summary: "Persistent homology features with configurable distance thresholds."
  description: "Generates per-residue topological descriptors using the persistent homology pipeline from new_topological_features. Interface residues are required as input."
  params:
    neighbor_distance: 8.0
    filtration_cutoff: 8.0
    min_persistence: 0.01
    dedup_sort: false
    element_filters:
      - [C]
      - [N]
      - [O]
      - [C, N]
      - [C, O]
      - [N, O]
      - [C, N, O]
    jobs: 16

# REQUIRED stage: node
node:
  module: node/dssp_topo_merge/v1  # alias: TopoQA default
  alias: "172D (140D Topological consumes Interface + 32D) TopoQA default"
  summary: "DSSP-derived node features merged with topology statistics."
  description: "Runs the DSSP-based node feature extractor (node_fea) and merges results with persistent homology statistics aligned by residue IDs."
  params:
    drop_na: true  # matches fea_df_clean = fea_df.dropna() in both inference_model.py and k_mac_inference_pca_tsne4.py
    jobs: 16

# REQUIRED stage: edge
edge:
  module: edge/legacy_band/v11
  alias: "TopoQA default 10A cutoff"
  summary: "11D legacy edge features (distance + atom distance histogram)."
  description: "Reproduces the original 11-dimensional edge attributes consisting of residue pair distance and a 10-bin histogram of inter-atomic distances, scaled to [0, 1]."
  params:
    distance_min: 0.0
    distance_max: 10.0
    scale_features: true
    jobs: 16
